thread.title: Secrets of Lake Ronkonkoma

author: newsday.com
title: Secrets of Lake Ronkonkoma
text:
Legends and tales of hauntings have shadowed Lake Ronkonkoma for years. Do you believe them? (Credit: Newsday / Thomas A. Ferrara)
Lake Ronkonkoma isn’t only the largest lake on Long Island – it’s also considered by many residents to be a place of haunting mystery going back to the days of the Native Americans. Some stories depict the murky waters as being bottomless or having secret underground connections to nearby waterways, while others describe it as having mystical healing powers or an uncanny tendency to rise and fall...
